title: 15 minute ban because of champ select glitch
body: I logged on league of legends today thinking I might play a few fun games, I queued up and entered my game, but when I got to champ select all I could see was a black screen. Confused, I clicked around my screen for about 60 seconds until I was kicked out to the menu screen. I re-queued, having to wait 5 minutes as a penalty before I could enter a game. I entered another game and the same bug happened. This time I have to wait 15 minutes to be able to queue once again. This penalty is completely unfair and I am not going to wait 15 minutes just to have the possibility of another black screen, and a longer ban. Can someone _**please**_ help?

replies.body: Typically that kind of black screen in champ select is caused by an unstable connection with the servers your network needs to connect with in order to have champ select function properly. First, make sure there aren't any firewalls or antivirus' that could be blocking that connection by trying a quick [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7).
